IX.ii.2.C.1.g
.
When No Rating Decision Is Required to Grant A&A
A rating decision is
not
required in any claim where A&A is presumed unless other claimed issues need to be rated.
If A&A has been granted based on nursing home or medical foster home status without a rating decision, and a claim is being considered on other issues, do not consider A&A in the rating decision.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - Special Monthly Pension (SMP) Ratings
